page.title: 13My Club-Cubs
page.content: We meet at the Parish Hall Cleobury Mortimer. To join you have to say a promise which is, " I promise, That I will do my best, To do my duty to God and the Queen, To help other people and keep the Cub Scout Law. " We wear a green jumper and cap which is our uniform, and a red and yellow necker which is for our pack only. The only rule is no fighting. Our pack leader is known as Akela. We play games like traffic lights, skittles, cricket and football. We also have to work for our proficiency badges such as athlete, book reader or explorer. We also go to camp in the summer. Each cub promises to obey the cub law "to do his best, think of others before himself and do a good deed every day".
